definition[0]: a small part of something that remains after the rest of it has been used, destroyed, or eaten
example[0]: The remnants of a meal stood on the table.
definition[1]: a small piece of cloth left from a larger piece and sold cheaply
definition[2]: part of something that is left after most of it has been removed, used, sold etc
example[1]: The last remnants of the troubled group have been sold.
